TextView.android:text:
AutoStartPermissionHelper by Koshur Boii - Apk Demo Version

Description:
AutoStartPermissionHelper is a valuable Android library crafted by Abrar Hussain Beigh, aka Koshur Boii. Its purpose is to streamline the process of checking and requesting auto-start permissions on various Android devices, ensuring a seamless user experience across different device manufacturers.
Developers can effortlessly integrate auto-start permission handling into their Android applications with this library.
